title: Goood
review: Its a good set to get mixed bricks and peices but i dont know about you i cant get to The legoideas site? mabey its my comp,  i like how the other sets follow in a downword trend like 1000 to 500 to 300 peices in the set

author: A_Brickset_user
title: Great bulk bricks box
review:
For what it is 4421 is excellent.  Containing just bricks (no plates, slopes or anything) it is a great way to build up your basic brick slection for little cost.

In the UK Argos are selling 4421 with a 4780 (500 pcs) free.  Great value.
